query: Generate a basic forecast for China datacenter UPS battery demand through 2035, showing VRLA to Li-ion transition
expected_behavior: Step 1: Loads datacenter growth data for China
Step 2: Loads VRLA and Li-ion cost data (BESS proxy for Li-ion)
Step 3: Calculates TCO for both technologies over 15-year horizon
Step 4: Identifies tipping point year (when Li-ion TCO < VRLA TCO sustained)
Step 5: Generates S-curve adoption model based on tipping point
Step 6: Decomposes demand into new-build and replacement components
Step 7: Tracks installed base evolution for VRLA and Li-ion separately
Step 8: Validates mass balance (Adds - Retirements = ΔInstalled_Base)
Generates CSV output with columns: Year, Total_Demand, VRLA_Demand, Li_Demand, VRLA_Share, Li_Share, VRLA_IB, Li_IB
Generates JSON output with TCO analysis, tipping point year, and adoption curve parameters
Shows tipping point around 2027 for China
Demonstrates S-curve adoption reaching 75-85% Li-ion share by 2035
New-build demand grows 7-10% annually, replacement demand dominates post-2030
Li-ion share increases monotonically after tipping point
